content: Use oven-sh/setup-bun@v2 with bun-version: latest. Quality gates order: bun install, bun run lint, bun run typecheck, bun test. Trigger on push and PR to main branch.

name: Auto-tag via workflow_run
description: Auto-tag triggers via workflow_run on CI completion with conclusion==success on main. Reads version from package.json (node -p), extracts from src/index.ts (grep -oP). Verifies match, checks tag idempotency with git tag -l, then creates git tag + GitHub release with gh release create --generate-notes. Requires permissions: contents: write.
